    • About Jody Donaldson


    Welcome to Jody Donaldson and The Donaldson Team of Century 21 New Millennium. We are proud to be part of the #1 Century 21 Firm in the World. I am a native of Northern Virginia and have over 18 years of Real Estate experience, both as an investor and an agent. We would love to help you purchase the home of your dreams or help you sell your current house. Call The Donaldson Team today!
